attributes.action: save Boss the kind, loving, dog he's not just a dog he is a family member
attributes.additional_details: please save boss the dog from being unfairly destroyed for something he didn't even do he passed all the assessments the police have carried out on him he is a lovely kind dog but has been wrongly accused of biting somebody a dog went to attack him and some lad put his arm in between both the dogs and it was the other dog that bit him this dog is not just a pet he is well looked after in a loving home he is a family member and he has 2 young children that love him to pieces he has never attacked another dog or human before in his life he has been away for a few months up to now and he will be scared and missing his family. You can see the love the dog has in his eyes in 3 months the case is going to crown court and if they decide he will be destroyed a family will loose a vital member and 2 children will loose their best friend please sign this petition to save him thanks in advance x
